mapper.insert: insert into t_baby_invite (id, user_code, invite_user_code, create_time, enable) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select id, user_code, invite_user_code, create_time, enable from t_baby_invite
mapper.delete: delete from t_baby_invite where id IN #{item}
